      • addBoard

        public void addBoard(Board b,
            int to,
            int from,
            AIPlayer p1,
            MoveGenerator mg)
        addBoard adds the board passed in with the move also passed in applied to it first. It then checks if any more moves can be made
        Parameters:
        b - the board passed in
        to - the destination of move
        from - the start of the move
        p1 - the player object
        mg - the move generator

      • thereIsADuplicate

        public boolean thereIsADuplicate(Board b)
        There is a duplicate. checks if there is already a duplicate of the board passed in already present in the list
        Parameters:
        b - the board it is checking against
        Returns:
        true, if there is a duplicate

      • selectBoard

        public Board selectBoard(Board currentBoard,

        Select board. This will select the best board from the list for the player to use
        Parameters:
        currentBoard - the current board
        p - the p
        Returns:
        the board that has been selected

        public Board individualDecision(Board currentBoard,
                       AIPlayer p)
        Individual decision. Is called by select board and it is where the individuals attributes influance the chosen board e.g. higher agression chance will produce more peices being taken
        Parameters:

        Returns:
